Text:
Thank you for this. I haven't seen it, but it looks interesting.

You said we may make requests.  I noticed you had some harder-to-find Christmas movies and I was wondering if you had a movie called "Christmas Eve" from 1986. I believe it also went by the name "Christmas Dove". It starred Loretta Young.

Here's the IMDB link:  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090838/

Thank you again for this upload.
